That would be odd considering his current manga (Busou no Renkin, if I'm correct)  is really quite new and still running Shonen Jump. Unless he's not happy with it...

Personally would love him to do Shinsengumi right.  As much as I like all these incarnations of the Shinsengumi, I think he takes it more seriously than some.

S
